title: 求一个整合包的问题
author: zhuwenhao
txt_content: 我安装了http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=79636这个整合包，之后又想安装http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=79636这个mod，结果将它放进mods文件夹后，一打开游戏就出现Minecraft has crashed! ，只有删掉后才能正常打开.我非常想玩这个mod，求大神帮助

replies.author: jk9875110
replies.txt_content: MCPC服务端`想玩啥就玩啥,妈妈再也不用担心我MOD问题

replies.author: dontcampy
replies.txt_content: 你难道不觉得网址发重了吗。。。还有别光说crash啊，crash报告呢？

replies.author: zhuwenhao
replies.txt_content:
奥。那个mod网址是[1.4.6/1.4.7][Forge][SSP/SMP][坑爹搬运][汉化]更多生物群系MOD—添加了60个生物群系
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-88060-1-1.html，crash报告


      Minecraft has crashed!
